parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.40

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mods and Addons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array of mods (CfgMods) in which the given config class is defined.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''configSourceModList''' config

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> config: [[Config]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[String]]s
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_mods = [[configSourceModList]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles" >> "Man");
[[hint]] [[str]] _mods; // ["A3","curator","heli"]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[configFile]], [[configSourceMod]], [[configSourceAddonList]], [[modParams]]
</value></part></template></root>
